channel.title: AWS on ModernApps by VMware Tanzu Home
channel.description: Recent content in AWS on ModernApps by VMware Tanzu Home

item.title: Using vRA to deploy AWS EKS Clusters and register with Tanzu Mission Control
item.description: A technical walkthrough using vRA Code Stream to deploy AWS EKS Clusters, register them as Kubernetes endpoints in vRA Cloud Assembly and Code Stream, and finally register the newly created cluster in Tanzu Mission Control.

item.title: Tanzu Mission Control – Delete a provisioned cluster
item.description: In this blog post we are going to cover off how to delete a Tanzu Kubernetes Grid cluster that has been provisioned by Tanzu Mission Control.

item.title: Tanzu Mission Control – Deploying TKG Clusters to AWS
item.description: This blog post will cover a technical walk-through on using Tanzu Mission Control to deploy Tanzu Kubernetes clusters to AWS.
